typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['Southridge/CloudSales/Orders/Orders.csv']) ~> salesorders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as decimal(10,0),
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['Southridge/CloudSales/OrderDetails/OrderDetails.csv']) ~> orderdetails
generateGlobalOrderID, orderdetails join(salesorders@OrderID == orderdetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> mergeOrderandOrderDetails
salesorders derive(GlobalOrderID = uuid(),
		SourceSystemID = 1) ~> generateGlobalOrderID
mergeOrderandOrderDetails sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalOrderID,
		SourceSystemOrderID = salesorders@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderCreatedDate = salesorders@CreatedDate,
		OrderUpdatedDate = salesorders@UpdatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrderDetailCreatedDate = orderdetails@CreatedDate,
		OrderDetailUpdatedDate = orderdetails@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> salesparquet
